generated_text:
- road: The image shows a multi-lane road with white lane markings and traffic flowing in both directions.
- sidewalk: Sidewalks are visible on both sides of the road, separated from the road by curbs and vegetation.
- building: Multiple buildings are visible along both sides of the street, including commercial and office structures.
- vegetation: Trees and grassy areas are present along the road and sidewalks.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, showing clouds.
- person: Pedestrians can be seen walking on the sidewalks.
- car: Several cars are visible on the road, including the vehicles directly in front of the camera.
- bus: A green bus is visible in the distance, traveling in the same direction as the camera.
- traffic light: Red traffic lights are visible at the intersection ahead.
- traffic sign: Various traffic signs are mounted on poles along the road.
- pole: Multiple poles are visible, including those supporting traffic lights and signs.
- terrain: Grass and small patches of vegetation are visible along the roadside and in the median strip.
